channel.title: contingencies on A sea kayak story
channel.description: Recent content in contingencies on A sea kayak story

item.title: The Contingencies
item.description: By far the biggest hazard on this trip is paddling alone and I strongly believe that I am prepared. Emergency contacts printed on a card on boat: VHF channel 16 In Atlantic Canada cell dialing *16 takes you directly to the Joint Rescue Coordination Centre (JRCC) Halifax 911 Coast Guard Toll-free: 1-800-565-1582 Telephone: 902-427-8200 Personal In terms of geography, there are areas on this trip where there are high cliffs and it is impossible to land.
